title: UML Class Diagram
description: Stencil set for UML 2.2 class diagrams.

stencils.title: Diagram
Diagramm
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    version="1.1">    <g>     <rect oryx:anchors="top bottom left right" x="0" y="0" width="80"       height="80" stroke="black" fill="#D3DEFF" stroke-width="2"/>    </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Class
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="72"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="45" oryx:anchors="left" />        <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="49" oryx:anchors="bottom" />        <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="5" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="45" oryx:anchors="right" />        <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />        <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="">     <rect id="classBorder" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="50" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.4" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="className" x="50" y="25" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Class
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="72"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="35" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="">     <rect id="classBorder" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="120" height="70" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.4" fill="white" />     <text font-size="12" id="className" x="60" y="10" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black"></text>     <text font-size="12" id="attributes" x="3" y="22" oryx:align="top left" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black"></text>     <text font-size="12" id="methods" x="3" y="42" oryx:align="top left" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black"></text>     <line x1="0" x2="120" y1="20" y2="20" oryx:resize="horizontal" oryx:anchors="top" />     <line x1="0" x2="120" y1="40" y2="40" oryx:resize="horizontal" oryx:anchors="top" id="separator" />   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Note
stencils.description_de: Kommentar mit Bezug zu einem Modellelement oder Diagramm
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="72"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="35" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="">     <path oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" d="M120 10 L110 10 L 110 0 L120 10 L120 70 L0 70 L0 0 L110 0" fill="white" stroke="black" />     <text font-size="12" id="text" x="60" y="35" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Interface
stencils.description: Contains a set of method signatures and attributes the implementing class must provide
stencils.description_de: Definiert eine Menge von Signaturen für Operationen und Attribute, die von der implementierenden Klasse angeboten werden müssen
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="72"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="35" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="">     <rect id="classBorder" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="120" height="70" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.4" fill="white" />     <line x1="0" x2="120" y1="30" y2="30" oryx:resize="horizontal" oryx:anchors="top" />     <text font-size="10" id="keyword" x="60" y="10" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black">≪interface≫</text>     <text font-size="12" id="name" x="60" y="22" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black" font-weight="bold"></text>     <text font-size="12" id="items" x="3" y="32" oryx:align="top left" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Enumeration
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="72"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="left" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="69" oryx:anchors="bottom" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="10" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="35" oryx:anchors="right" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="119" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />      <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="35" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 40" oryx:maximumSize="">     <rect id="classBorder" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="120" height="70" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.4" fill="white" />     <line x1="0" x2="120" y1="30" y2="30" oryx:resize="horizontal" oryx:anchors="top" />     <text font-size="10" id="keyword" x="60" y="10" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black">≪enumeration≫</text>     <text font-size="12" id="name" x="60" y="22" oryx:align="middle center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black" font-weight="bold"></text>     <text font-size="12" id="items" x="60" y="32" oryx:align="top center" oryx:anchors="top" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: n-ary Association
stencils.description: Association between more than two elements
stencils.description_de: Assoziation an der mehr als zwei Modellelemente beteiligt sind
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="50"    height="50"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes"/>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="25"/>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="50"/>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="0"/>     <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="25"/>   </oryx:magnets>   <g oryx:minimumSize="50 50" oryx:maximumSize="50 50">     <path d="M0 25 L25 50 L50 25 L25 0 L0 25" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Undirected Association
stencils.description: Association between classes without navigatability restrictions
stencils.description_de: Assoziation zwischen Klassen ohne Angabe einer Navigationsrichtung
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2"/>   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Directed Association
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">     <path d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#end)"/>   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Unnavigable Directed Association
stencils.description: Directed Association between two classes restricted to one navigation direction
stencils.description_de: Gerichtete Assoziation mit Beschränkung auf eine Navigationsrichtung
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">     <path d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>    </marker>    <marker id="begin" refX="0" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">       <path d="M 0 0 L 10 10" fill="none" stroke="black" />       <path d="M 0 10 L 10 0" fill="none" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#end)" marker-start="url(#begin)"/>   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Qualified Association
stencils.description: Association between classes with a qualifying attribute
stencils.description_de: Assoziation zwischen Klassen mit einem qualifizierenden Attribut
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="start" refX="0" refY="7" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="40" markerHeight="14" orient="auto">     <rect id="qualifierBorder" oryx:resize="" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="14" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.4" fill="white" />    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">     <text id="qualifier" x="2" y="0" stroke="black" oryx:edgePosition="startMiddle"></text>   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-start="url(#start)"/>   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Generalization
stencils.description: Generalization indicates inheritance relations between elements
stencils.description_de: Generalisierung gibt Ableitungsbeziehungen zwischen Elementen wieder
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">     <path d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0 L 0 10" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#end)" marker-start="url(#begin)"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="keyword" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midBottom"/>  </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Realization
stencils.description: Realization of an interface by a class
stencils.description_de: Realisierung einer Schnittstelle durch eine Klasse
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">     <path d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0 L 0 10" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#end)" stroke-dasharray="3, 4"/>   <text id="role" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Dependency
stencils.description: Dependency relation between model elements (e.g classes, interfaces)
stencils.description_de: Abhängigkeitsbeziehung zwischen Modellelementen wie Klassen und Schnittstellen
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="end" refX="10" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="10" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">     <path d="M 0 10 L 10 5 L 0 0" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-end="url(#end)" stroke-dasharray="3, 4"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="keyword" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Aggregation
stencils.description: Aggregations represent a <has-a> relationship. The existance of the 'parts' does not depend on the 'whole'.
stencils.description_de: Eine Aggregation beschreibt eine Ganzes-Teile-Beziehung. Die Existenz eines Teils hängt nicht von der Existens des Ganzen ab.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="start" refX="1" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="22" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">     <path d="M 1 6 L 11 11 L 21 6 L 11 1 L 1 6" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-start="url(#start)" />   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Composition
stencils.description: Compositions represent a <consists-of> relationship. 'Parts' can not exist without an associated 'Whole'.
stencils.description_de: Eine Komposition beschreibt eine existenzabhängige Ganzes-Teile-Beziehung. Die Teile können nicht ohne ein assoziiertes Ganzes existieren.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>   <marker id="start" refX="1" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="22" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">     <path d="M 1 6 L 11 11 L 21 6 L 11 1 L 1 6" fill="black" stroke="black" stroke-width="1"/>    </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" marker-start="url(#start)" />   <text id="cardinalityStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   <text id="roleStart" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startBottom"/>   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop"/>   <text id="cardinalityEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endTop"/>   <text id="roleEnd" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="endBottom"/>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Annotation Edge
stencils.description: Connects a note with a model element
stencils.description_de: Verbindet eine Notiz mit einem Modellelement
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0">  <defs>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M50 50 L100 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4"/>   <text id="role" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>   </g> </svg>
